document_data.caption: ''Cover of Under Illefarn''
document_data.title: Under Illefarn
document_data.author: [[Steve Perrin]]
document_data.realm year: ''Circa'' [[1359 DR]]<ref group="note">[[Kelson Darktreader]] was 58 years old during ''Under Illefarn'' and [[Pwyll Daggerford]] was serving as Duke after his father's death in the [[First Dragonspear War]]. This is consistent with ''Spawn of Dragonspear'', in which Kelson Darktreader was 55 at the time of the [[First Dragonspear War]] of [[1356 DR]]. However, ''The North: Guide to the Savage Frontier'', set in [[1370 DR]], gives his age as 73, a discrepancy of four years that conflicts with both of the other books.
document_data.released: September 1987<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://www.dmsguild.com/product/16801/N5-Under-Illefarn-%281e%29|title=N5 Under Illefarn (1e)|accessmonthday=October 31|accessyear=2013|author=Shannon Appelcline|publisher=Dungeon Masters Guild}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Under Illefarn''''' is a  1st-edition ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' adventure that was set in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]''. 
{{Quote|''A curse is on the land.''

''[[Daggerford]] is fairly quiet for a frontier town. Sure, lizard men raid the local baron's holding now and then, orcs sneak out of the [[Misty Forest]] to raid caravans on the [[Trade Way]], and [[Bronwyn Daggerford|Lady Bronwyn]] has a few suitors who are a touch too passionate, but there's nothing going on that a member of the renowned Daggerford militia can't handle.''

''Except that the [[Shining River]] has turned green, and cattle are dying. Except that the Elf King of [[Laughing Hollow]], a place where no human dares to go without fearing for his life, is asking the militia for help. Except that strange substances are oozing from the fissures caused by a recent earthquake. Except that the earthquake also has opened an entrance in the cliffs around Laughing Hollow that might lead to the fabled dwarf mines of [[Illefarn]].''

''Suddenly, being a militiaman isn't quite as easy as it used to be...''}}
document_data.Summary: The adventure is a scenario designed for beginning players in the ''[[Forgotten Realms]]'' setting. The player characters are residents of the town of [[Daggerford]], and are therefore automatically members of the town militia and thus required to deal with local perils, such as fighting [[lizardmen]] raiders, rescuing a kidnapped noblewoman, and guarding a caravan. The module describes Daggerford and its personalities, as well as the nearby dwarf and orc lairs of [[Illefarn]].<ref>
